Gigamon provides active visibility into physical and virtual network traffic enabling stronger security and superior performance. Gigamon’s Visibility Fabric™ and GigaSECURE®, the industry’s first Security Delivery Platform, deliver advanced intelligence so that security, network and application performance management solutions in enterprise, government and service provider networks operate more efficiently and effectively. With over ten years’ experience, Gigamon solutions are deployed globally across vertical markets including over seventy-five percent of the Fortune 100.

At Spark, children from a local SF middle school are paired up with an older "buddy," and meet once a week for a few hours to work on a final project, socialize, and learn from each other. Final projects range from building websites or movies to making music, presentations, or whatever else the pairs agree upon. It's a wonderful experience for children to ask about potential careers in the future, homework help, or just have an older figure to look up to and confide in that has their back. To learn more about Spark and enroll in this fantastic program, visit www.sparkprogram.org

recommendations: May 21, 2015, Ariana worked with Hannah in the same group

I have had the pleasure of working with Ariana on a number of different marketing based projects.  As a Gesher Group business consultant, she continuously exceeded expectations and proved to be extremely driven and accountable. She is a great team player and does not hesitate to take initiative.  Her diligent work ethic quickly earned her a Project Manager role, in which she successfully lead a team of 4 responsible for designing a marketing strategy for a mobile application start-up. Ariana is fueled by her willingness to learn and grow, and is not afraid to ask questions. She is an extremely hard worker who possesses advanced leadership, marketing, and interpersonal skills, and I believe she would bring great value to any company.

I've had the pleasure of overseeing and working with Ariana in a number of capacities over the past few years. She has always impressed me with her ability to adapt across varying projects, clients, and team members. Her leadership and planning abilities have proven extremely useful in the marketing strategy and communications projects she completed in particular. Not to mention she has a great attitude and can be infectious with her positivity. Overall, I highly recommend her because she is a true problem solver and has proven that she can be of great value at any type of organization.

We were really fortunate to find Chris for our video directing and editing needs! Not only was he such a pleasure to work with, he was very professional and resourceful. He quickly understood our video requirements, and was timely in his deliverables and responses. He worked within our budget and made sure we were 100% satisfied with the result. I would definitely hire Chris again for future product videos.
